00017 RenderTexture::RenderTexture(string name, int width, int height)
00018 {
00019     this->name = name;
00020         this->width = width;
00021         this->height = height;
00022         handle = SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager()->Target_Create(width, height, true);
00023 
00024         cam = NULL;
00025 }

00027 RenderTexture::~RenderTexture()
00028 {
00029         removeAllUpdateListeners();
00030         removeAllRenderListeners();
00031         SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager()->Target_Free(handle);
00032 }

00034 int RenderTexture::getTexture()
00035 {
00036         return SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager()->Target_GetTexture(handle);

00039 void RenderTexture::update()
00040 {
00041     list<UpdateListener*>::const_iterator iter;
00042     for (iter = updateListeners.begin(); iter != updateListeners.end(); ++iter)
00043         (*iter)->update(this);
00044 }
00045 
00047 void RenderTexture::render()
00048 {
00049     if (cam != NULL)
00050     {
00051         HGE* hge = SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager();
00052         hge->Gfx_BeginScene(handle);
00053         hge->Gfx_Clear(0);
00054 
00055         list<RenderableListener*>::const_iterator iter;
00056         for (iter = renderListeners.begin(); iter != renderListeners.end(); ++iter)
00057             (*iter)->render(this);
00058 
00059         hge->Gfx_EndScene();
00060     }
00061 }
